summary: AN ORDINANCE Relating to the City Light Department, authorizing the execution of a ground lease for the excess portion of the City Light Department's Morningside Substation property in the southeast quarter of Section 33, Township 26 North, Range 4 East, W.M., in King County, Washington to Carol Bishop and Scott Goodrich, dba Lakeview Homes, for a 7-year period commencing May 1, 1993. (P.M. \#260433-4-404)
